content: perfect for lounging around the house or when you re out and about this crochet hoodie is a trendy way to show your casual style stitched in bernat softee cotton this smartly shaped pullover is made with 2 folded hexagons and a hood to complete the look practice double_crochet decreases slip_stitch and more bold earthy tones make this a versatile choice with jeans or your favorite cargo pants materials bernat® softee cotton™ 4 2 oz/120 g 254 yds/232 m sizes xs/s m/l 1/2/3xl 4/5xl contrast a warm red 69007 3 4 4 5 balls contrast b golden 69023 2 3 3 3 balls contrast c seaside blue 69011 2 3 3 3 balls gauges 16 single_crochet and 20 row = 4 10 cm 6 groups of 3 double_crochet = 5 12 5 cm finished chest xs/s 38 96 5 cm m/l 42 106 5 cm 1/2/3xl 56 142 cm 4/5xl 60 152 5 cm
